text: Leonard A. Mastroni (May 28, 1949 â€“ September 30, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Republican member for the 117th district in the Kansas House of Representatives from 2017 to 2020. Mastroni was born in Bridgeport, Connecticut. Mastroni died on September 30, 2020 in La Crosse, Kansas at age 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the Kansas Legislature Category:Politicians from Kansas Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:People from Bridgeport, Connecticut Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Leonard Mastroni
